subject: Debian Beryl on Asus A6B
body:
Hi everyone,I am using debian 4.0r0 and I want to run Beryl on my computer. When I start Beryl, system make a splash and beryl manager was stopped autamatically. My Firend is able to run beryl on ubuntu 7.04. How I solve this problem, is theer anyone who had same problem?
Thanks-- Ramazan AYYILDIZAnalyst & Developerhttp://www.rayyildiz.com
